description: Simple Arduino project with LED control, button input, and serial communication for debugging
requirements: Control LED on pin 13 with digital output
Read button state from pin 2 with internal pull-up
Send status messages via Serial at 9600 baud
Toggle LED when button is pressed
Display button press count on Serial monitor

modules.name: LED Control Module
modules.description: Controls built-in LED on pin 13 for visual feedback

modules.name: Button Input Module
modules.description: Reads digital button state from pin 2 with debouncing

modules.name: Serial Communication
modules.description: UART communication for debugging and status messages at 9600 baud
